cloud_project_delete_info: You will be sent an email within the next 24 hours to confirm that all the project resources will be permanently deleted. This action is irreversible, all the data will be immediately lost and all OVH and OpenStack users will lose access to the project.
cloud_project_delete_info_bill: A final invoice (amounting to approximately {{ bill }} ) for your on demand usage will be issued within 24 hours of confirmation.
cloud_project_delete_info_credits: After this invoice is paid, all credit and vouchers related to this project will be lost.
cloud_project_delete_email_sent: You will be sent a confirmation email within 24 hours.
cloud_project_delete_error: An error occurred when deleting your project.
cloud_project_delete_error_title: An error occurred when retrieving your project's information.
cloud_project_delete_error_refresh_cache: If necessary, you can always try by resetting your local cache:
cloud_project_delete_error_contact_suppo: If the problem continues, you can contact support by clicking
cloud_project_delete_resource_warning_ma: Your {{ amountInstance }} servers will be destroyed.
cloud_project_delete_resource_warning_on: Your additional hard disk will be destroyed.
cloud_project_delete_resource_warning_ma: Your {{ amountVolume }} additional hard disks will be destroyed.
Your {{ amountSnapshot }} snapshots and images will be destroyed.
cloud_project_delete_resource_warning_on: Your storage container will be destroyed.
cloud_project_delete_resource_warning_ma: Your {{ amountStorage }} storage containers will be destroyed.
cloud_project_delete_resource_warning_on: Your OVH failover IP will be destroyed.
cloud_project_delete_resource_warning_ma: Your {{ amountIpFailoverOvh }} OVH failover IPs will be destroyed.
cloud_project_delete_resource_warning_on: Your Cloud failover IP will parked.
cloud_project_delete_resource_warning_ma: Your {{ amountIpFailoverCloud }} Cloud failover IPs will be destroyed.
